```python
>>> import numpy as np
>>> import pandas as pd
>>> df = pd.DataFrame(np.random.randn(5, 5))
>>> df
0	1	2	3	4
0	1.357249	1.131003	-0.019803	0.099829	-0.919095
1	1.026551	-2.055496	-0.582692	-0.282761	0.723739
2	-0.325256	-0.660279	1.482294	-0.528524	-0.989139
3	-1.207460	-0.059461	1.625115	-0.148521	0.138442
4	-0.226491	-0.267409	0.099868	-1.856469	0.331746
>>> df.where(df < 0, other=1)
0	1	2	3	4
0	1.000000	1.000000	-0.019803	1.000000	-0.919095
1	1.000000	-2.055496	-0.582692	-0.282761	1.000000
2	-0.325256	-0.660279	1.000000	-0.528524	-0.989139
3	-1.207460	-0.059461	1.000000	-0.148521	1.000000
4	-0.226491	-0.267409	1.000000	-1.856469	1.000000
>>> n = 10
>>> df = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(n, 3), columns=list('abc'))
>>> df
           a	       b	       c
0	0.632300	0.468338	0.252273
1	0.433077	0.512041	0.826398
2	0.248815	0.613848	0.040349
3	0.933047	0.229752	0.371287
4	0.012319	0.220920	0.645379
5	0.052470	0.789802	0.985254
6	0.179129	0.342947	0.307522
7	0.055029	0.830519	0.848535
8	0.555958	0.531345	0.105983
9	0.103906	0.283080	0.906498
>>> df.query('a<b & b< c', inplace=False)
           a	       b	       c
0	0.632300	0.468338	0.252273
1	0.433077	0.512041	0.826398
2	0.248815	0.613848	0.040349
3	0.933047	0.229752	0.371287
4	0.012319	0.220920	0.645379
5	0.052470	0.789802	0.985254
6	0.179129	0.342947	0.307522
7	0.055029	0.830519	0.848535
8	0.555958	0.531345	0.105983
9	0.103906	0.283080	0.906498
```
